newsitem.title: USA: Frank Gifford says marriage still solid.
newsitem.headline: Frank Gifford says marriage still solid.

text.p: ABC News sportcaster Frank Gifford, whose hotel room encounter with another woman was videotaped by a tabloid newspaper, said Tuesday his marriage to Kathy Lee Gifford remains solid.
Gifford was attending an ABC network affiliates meeting at Walt Disney World. As he left the convention hall through a kitchen delivery bay, he was asked by a reporter how his marriage was doing.
Smiling, Gifford replied, "It's good. It's solid," and jumped into a waiting van.

The Gifford marriage has been the target of speculation since The Globe supermarket tabloid began publishing photographs and audio-tape transcripts of Frank Gifford's alleged tryst with a Florida woman in a New York hotel.

In his first public appearance since the story broke, Gifford made no reference to marital woes as he and broadcast-booth partners Al Michaels and Dan Dierdorf briefed local television affiliates about the coming football season.

ABC News broadcaster Barbara Walters said the Giffords and their two children were staying at a Disney resort hotel during the meeting. Kathy Lee Gifford is co-host of Live with Regis and Kathy Lee, a syndicated morning talk show.
